definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: Take advantage of exit interviews, and diplomatically explain your stance.
sentences.chinese: 好好利用告別的面談，婉轉的解釋你的立場。

sentences.english: He needed some Dutch courage before facing his boss about the pay increase.
sentences.chinese: 他需要喝點酒壯壯膽，才能當老闆的面談加薪的事。

sentences.english: The matter can not be discussed except at a personal interview.
sentences.chinese: 這件事只能在面談時討論。

sentences.english: Add a new interview result document for this change.
sentences.chinese: 爲這項變更添加一個新的面談結果文件。

sentences.english: HR manager and i have appointed to a interview at tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 人事處經理與我約定明天上午面談。

sentences.english: We would like to discuss the duration of the contract with you at the interview.
sentences.chinese: 面談時我們再和您商洽契約的期限。

sentences.english: She was jumpy during her job interview because she was so nervous.
sentences.chinese: 她在應徵面談的時候心驚肉跳，因爲她太緊張了。

sentences.english: Jacobs would like to set up an interview for early next week.
sentences.chinese: 雅可布先生想在下週早些時候約你面談一次。

sentences.english: During the fair, different forms of interviews will be staged.
sentences.chinese: 在活動週期間將舉行多種形式的面談。

sentences.english: Normally applicants can get an interview within one or two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 通常，簽證申請人可在一兩週內就獲面談。

sentences.english: Mr Jackey would like to set an interview for earlier next week.
sentences.chinese: 雅可布先生想在下週早些時候約你面談一次。

sentences.english: Walk over and talk to him.
At this time, yellow to porch call to let the son restaurant interview.
sentences.chinese: 此時，黃以軒打來電話讓兒子來餐廳面談。

sentences.english: Would you allow me _ to talk about my personal circs _?
sentences.chinese: 您可否讓我跟您面談我的個人情況呢？

sentences.english: I always get the collywobbles before an interview.
sentences.chinese: 我在面談前總心神不寧。

sentences.english: But as you know，we have dozens of applicants to be answered.
sentences.chinese: 但你也知道，我們還有幾個應徵者要面談。

definition: to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
variant of 聯絡|联络[lian2 luo4]
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks
